website_summaries.verdict: Discreet, natural, and exceptionally long-lasting, this eco-friendly car air freshener completely eliminates odors rather than simply masking them with chemical-based fragrances.
pros: All natural bamboo charcoal absorbs and eliminates all odors
Ideal for anyone with chemical/fragrance sensitivities, allergies, or asthma
Discreet design fits neatly over headrests and blends well with any automotive interior
cons: If you’re looking for a fragranced air freshener, this might not be for you

website_summaries.verdict: With no chemicals and no electricity required, this bamboo charcoal air freshener "sponges" odors of the air in your car.
pros: Made of highly sustainable bamboo and hemp
Affordable and long-lasting - up to a year
No artificial fragrances to worry about
The discreet freshener hangs on the back of neck rest
cons: A few users complain it isn't strong enough to absorb their car odors

customer_reviews.title: Removing Oders
customer_reviews.text: I bought a previously owned vehicle that a smoker had owned. Despite the Dealer treating it saying the smell would be gone it was not. I saw your product and had hope. It arrived on Sunday 10-21-18. I activated it for 2 hours in the sun on my patio. Then put it in my vehicle. It has been in there now for 6 day's and I am not seeing very much improvement so far... I realize that cigarette smoke is difficult to remove but it is driving my wife crazy!! Am I expecting too much too soon? What can I do? Hope you can help with your product....
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: This Thing works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works! I bought a used truck with a really strong cigarette smoke odor inside. Every time I opened the door of the truck I got a strong whiff of cigarette! It got to the point I would cringe each time! I put on this PURGGO Car Air Freshener and within 48 hours the smell was completely gone! There is no longer ANY odor inside my truck. This air freshener also looks good inside a vehicle (as opposed to something sitting on the dash inside a white plastic container or hanging on the rear view mirror. Just mount the PURGGO behind the seat and enjoy the smell of....nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for a small suv. My 3y/o spilled her milk in the car and didn’t say anything. Naturally, the car started to smell. Once we identified the smell we scrubbed and cleaned the seats. We used baking soda and many other recommendations to get rid of the smell. We found these and reviews said they worked for this very issue,. Unfortunately, after almost 2 weeks the smell is still present and these have done nothing. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: PURGGO Car Air Freshner: Effective and Smart
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to take an environment-friendly approach to car air fresheners, while also looking for an alternate solution that doesn’t involve sticking something in front of my windshield (as hanging objects can be annoying). PURGGO’s product solves both problems for me AND it’s smartly designed! Subtle and functional. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Discreet and effective
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that travel with me several times a week to and from various walking trails. Often they get into the car wet or muddy and that leaves an odor that later even I, with a bad nose, can smell. After one week with Purgggo in the vehicle I've noticed a huge difference and others have as well. We'll see how it holds up over time but it was easy to install, looks very discreet and doesn't smell like a cheap perfume air freshener you'd find in an NYC taxi.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a few months but not for the expected 365 days.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well at first but then loses its effectiveness over time. Mine lasted about 5 months before I started noticing that it was no longer eliminating odors. I followed the instructions to recharge it several times but it didn't seem to make a difference. I guess for 20 bucks it wasn't a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard124

customer_reviews.title: Works but slow
customer_reviews.text: Item came in perfect packaging, no complain about that. Instructions were pretty self-explanatory. Only thing is that it is taking a long time to absorb the odor. My car had a strong smoke odor when I bought it 2 weeks back. I have attached PURRGO air freshener since last one week, the odor is less bothering now but it is still there at large. So even though the product works but it works pretty slow. I hope in another week or so the situation will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Somsubhra Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: Dry it out and let it loose, it works great
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed at first but here is what I found out. Do not secure it tightly, it is best to keep it loose so it can swing a little. Also very important to dry it out on sun even before the first use, I left it behind the windshield on the sun and that did the job. For the first 2 days it was not changing anything and I thought oh well, I wasted 20 buck. But once I dried it and let it loose as described below it took any smells away from my car, seriously amazing.
customer_reviews.author: stephane

customer_reviews.title: Works great for mysterious stench in car
customer_reviews.text: My car started developing a wet moldy stench last year. We tried everything the mechanic advised, blew Lysol through all the vents, etc etc. it still stank. I put two of these on the backs of the car seats as shown and within two days there was a marked improvement. I had already tried several other products that did nothing so I highly recommend this product for bad smelling cars.
customer_reviews.author: Anonagal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Took over a lease for a car. The owner stated vehemently that he didn’t smoke, but every time I get into my hubby car I can smell embedded smoke (I have an extraordinary sense of smell). Tried this product for the past 1 month, no difference. Followed directions exactly as it stated. I would rec trying something else. 2 stars Bc it’s not annoying in the front of the car and it’s in the back seat and no overwhelming smell, but wouldn’t rec this product.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Effective odor neutralizer
customer_reviews.text: So I had a curdled milk smell in my car. I bought one of those car bomb air freshener things which covered up the curdled milk but made me feel like I was riding around with a guy with way too much cologne. So I ordered the Purggo car air freshener and I am happy to say that it is getting rid of the cologne smell very nicely. I was just aiming for absence of odor and that's what this will get you. I bought the grey and it blends in with my grey upholstery without being too noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Has no scent but does the job !!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a regular smoker but hate the smell in my truck. Was looking for a good odor remover. Saw this one, thought it was pricey but would be well worth it, if it got rid of smell. Sure enough after setting up you can just tell the difference and don’t smell like smoke no more. Only thing is it don’t have a scent, but on the other hand means you can always switch up the scent since this product says it last for 365 days. Recommend if you smoke and don’t like the odor in your vechicle
customer_reviews.author: Gene Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. I get migraines and the scent from traditional air fresheners would compound a migraine setting in. (Normally when I feel a migraine coming I will immediately drive home so I can lay down, the air freshener would just bring the migraine on faster). So the LACK of smell, not only keeps my a car feeling fresh on a day to day basis but, also helps when it comes to smell sensitivity. Originally had the lighter color but changed out for this darker to match the interior of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Coons

customer_reviews.title: Starting smoking again, and this kills the smell
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's advertised to do, and does it well. Personally I have a weak sense of smell and picked up smoking in my pickup again. Sister who uses is rarely complains about the smell, full 24 hours later since my last cigarette and cracked the windows to breath in the last hours left it odorless. So with time the annoying smells get absorbed but this isn't an instant thing so be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Another placebo on the market
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do much. I still have weird smells coming from the car, just not much. It's a brand new car, and I work construction. I keep my boots in the car, and my car kind of smells like an animal. Even with this in the car, and the boots not, it doesn't do much. I'm going back to my California scents which actually work. This carbon fad does not.
customer_reviews.author: Kara W.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It did nothing. It says it takes a month but then you right to return is over. So I’m out $20.
customer_reviews.author: sharon schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying I had really high hopes for the product and was so excited when I received it. I followed the instructions and let it sit in direct sunlight for one hour.. it’s been in my car for a few days and my car still has the same smell prior to having this product. $20 for this is a rip off!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye overpowering scented air fresheners
customer_reviews.text: This works surprisingly well! I have a long daily commute and found my car was getting a little...stale. I’m not big on scented air fresheners, so this air purifier was great. It just hangs on the back of my seat, so I don’t even have to see it. My parking spot get enough sunlight during the day that I don’t need to leave it in the sun to “refresh” it every few months, which is recommended. Since finding this, I have purchased other charcoal air fresheners for the other problem areas in my life...near the cat box, by the laundry hamper, in my gym shoes...because it’s a great alternative to sprays and plug ins.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My car smelled of tobacco from the prior owner. The fabric has been detailed but the order remained. I live in a hot climate so my car was embarrassingly stinky all the time. I purchased this item after reading the reviews and I am so glad I did. I placed it on the back of the passenger side on Friday night and by Monday my car was odor free...and is still odor free three months later. I'm giving these as Christmas gifts to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn E Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the horrible smell in my husband's truck so I decided to give this product a try. It works! We have four children and they often leave their dirty socks, lacrosse gear, ballet shoes, wet towels, food leftovers, and all kids of other smelly stuff in the truck. The smell is just terrible, ever after cleaning everything out. I tried every air freshener I could find, and they only aggravated my allergies but didn't solve the problem. This product is odorless and it somehow magically worked! I'm getting a second one for my commuter car. Thank you PURGGO!! :)
customer_reviews.author: VIRNA VILLAGOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't make a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2005 car with cloth seats. I was hoping this would remove the dingy old smell from my car, unforuantely I haven't noticed any difference :/ I wouldn't recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle vG

customer_reviews.title: Great for absorbing new car smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to soak up the toxic new car smell in my new vehicle because I’m pregnant but also that’s not good for anybody. I was hoping the 2 pack would completely eliminate it and they’ve done a great job, about 60% gone in one day, and 80% of odor is gone after a week. The vehicle continues to off gas, especially in the sun so I’m debating if I need to order two more and toss these as I’m not sure if they continue soaking the odor or if they get “full”. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Baker Shrout

customer_reviews.title: It stays out of the way hangs on the back ...
customer_reviews.text: It stays out of the way hangs on the back of your head dressed and it sits right over where my dogs its so it does help absorb some of her think lol and it is something they can be rejuvenated by putting in the Sun I guess its not mechanical no plugins no wires we will see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it... I just can’t
customer_reviews.text: Not even remotely worth it. Which totally stinks because I really wanted to love this. Like, in theory this thing is freaking amazing. But it legit didn’t do a thing at all. If you put your nose on the fabric and sniff, you can smell a faint food smell. Other than that, like I said, literally didn’t do a thing. Hopefully they can fix it in the future for newer products.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Shahoud

customer_reviews.title: 365 days? LOL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Purgo in December 2018 because I had a dog. It worked for a few months and I thought it was a good deal. But then after I got rid of my dog I started getting car smell complaints. I tried to shake the Purgo and move it in my car but nothing. There is no guarantee or warranty for this product. You should spend half as much and but the Fabreze vent air fresheners that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: I inherited a clean work car that only smelled strongly ...
customer_reviews.text: I inherited a clean work car that only smelled strongly of cologne/fabric softener. Even with my cleaning of the seat belts and fabric seats, this didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Works but you need to need understand odors.
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these. One for my Wife's car that has a moisture odor and my new Chevy to help with that new car smell. Not a fan of gassing plastic. Both have done a great job but it's not going to remove and deep odors that have penetrated the carpet or headliner. That requires a repair first in order to remove those types of faults.
customer_reviews.author: No B.S.

customer_reviews.title: simple but efficient
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect that it works, just thought I give it a try. Because I use the bike often to get to locations where I can run or cycle, the smell of sweat was always there, sharp and annoying. I started to look into options to get rid of this smell and came across this product. OK, trying it would not harm much. I did place it in the car, and I wasn't using the car for two days but when I got in again the smell was gone. Now every time I step in I am amazed that it worked so efficiently, still can not believe it...
customer_reviews.author: Solipsist in a Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works
customer_reviews.text: Have had it in the car for about a year, not really sure how much it works. It said something about activating the charcoal in sunlight. I would think that's a one time thing only, but I feel like it only ever works (if at all) is if the car's sitting in the scorching sun. Usually i park indoors, when i sit in the car it smells like what a car cabin would smell like (its clean, so doesnt reek but smells of leather or whatever). Don't think the car's de-odorized well
customer_reviews.author: Safder

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical, but proven otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I was actually skeptical, I pretty much live out of my car I take showers at a truck stop and leave the dirty clothes in my car all week until I get a chance to go home, I thought what the heck and gave them a try. Low and behold.... it actually really works. Granted, I had one heck of a stinky car but this took away a good 75% and the smell was only right near the dirty bag. I am going to buy one for my truck as well now.
customer_reviews.author: The man without a plan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! No more smoke smell in my car! This product is amazing. No more smoke smell in my car! Purchased on for our small kitchen and it works great! I have been telling people how wonderful it works.
customer_reviews.author: ArleenThompson

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I forgot a small 8" watermelon on the rear floor of my car until it over-ripened and began to leak. I had the carpet professionally cleaned and I treated the area with deodorizer, but a slight unpleasant odor has remained. I didn't want to mask it with equally unpleasant scented products, so I tried Purggo. To my surprise, it has worked wonderfully, and with no scent of its own. The gray color blends with my car's interior, making it unobtrusive. I'm buying more to use in musty storage areas.
customer_reviews.author: WalksWithCats

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 large dogs, and while they don't normally smell bad, a trip to the lake for a swim can make them a little stinky. Since putting this in our truck, we haven't noticed any wet dog smell at all! The truck is only a year old, and we weren't smelling that new truck smell for the last couple of months either, but it has returned! I love how this hangs off of the head rest too. We never even notice that it is there. I need to buy one for the other truck! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H.

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed (and didn’t expect to be)
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty impressed with this item. I drive a 20 year old vehicle that suffered interior damage that led to a permanent faint mild scent. It was awful and no air freshener or amount of cleaning/ detailing has overcome it. Until now. It’s unbelievable that this charcoal pack has absorbed that long- lingering smell. I actually laughed to myself when I bought this because NOTHING has helped up until now! I would definitely buy this again and likely will just get another for our other vehicle. This filter truly has me impressed.
customer_reviews.author: camphouse

customer_reviews.title: it's so "nothing"
customer_reviews.text: love it!! my husband put one in our car & the second in the R.V. I didn't even think about it until you asked for a review. It's so nothing! Just what I wanted. How nice to have vehicles with NO smell. He wanted some kind of "stinkerator" for our vehicles but I hesitated because of friends with chemical sensitivities. Now we have a fresh car and friends who are not choked up.
customer_reviews.author: McMaggie

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have two cars. One newer that we use for road trips, etc. my husband and I are both smokers. After our last road trip, I took it to be cleaned inside and out. I had already received this air freshener, so I put it in behind the front passenger seat. WOW!! No cigarette odor anymore!! I was skeptical at first, but this work great!! Instructions say take it out once a month, lay it in the sun. No big deal. I have a reminder on my cell phone calendar. We are very pleased with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Trishb621

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a 07 car and took it to a detail shop for a deep cleaning after i took the car from the car wash my car was smelling like dead fish i left the trunk and all four doors open for half day in the hot sun to kill the bad smell but still the bad smell was felt inside my car. I bought this product and put it on my car soon as I received it and in the last 12 hours almost 75 percent of the bad smell is gone so im very thankful for the quality of this product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Farhad

customer_reviews.title: Natural air purifier for cars or small rooms.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical about the product. When I received the item it was nicely packaged. I read the instructions and placed one of them in my car. My car at first smelled like dogs, since I own two Akitas. After a day of usage in my car about 85% of the dog odor disappeared. I will be back here to update after a month of usage.
customer_reviews.author: d.s

customer_reviews.title: Not recharging
customer_reviews.text: Tried sitting this in the Florida sunlight to recharge and it didn't do anything
customer_reviews.author: Zachary N.

customer_reviews.title: works miraculously well
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very sensitive to odor. She does not like any kind of smell in the car and I am very lazy person who doesn't like to clean the car too often. I did not feel any change in couple of days after putting it in the car but then comes a very long trip. During the trip we had food and wet clothes in the car for days under blazing hot sun and It should have been stinking but I don't smell any kind of odor from the car. It works miracles.
customer_reviews.author: Akki

customer_reviews.title: Bought a smelly Sprinter and NOBODY is complaining that my van stinks.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is working very well, but it’s hard to tell. I have a commercial Sprinter van that was very smelly inside when I purchased it. I cleaned it out the best I could and added this to the back of the seat. The van smells way better. Maybe I need another one to make sure. It’s a nice looking product. Nobody is complaining that my van stinks. I guess that is what matters the most! Lol.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Coupon Included with Purchase! Works Wonders! Adjustable Straps!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I had an odd smell in my car with no identifiable source (EW!). This product has eliminated the odor without a masking "fresh" scent. The straps on the deodorizer are adjustable and I hung mine on my driver side seat. The package has a convenient notch for tearing so no need for scissors, and it comes with a coupon for your next purchase from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: vohall

customer_reviews.title: A Working Odor Eliminator
customer_reviews.text: I keep the Purggo on my drivers seat back, and seems to work quite well. If you are expecting an "auto freshener" this is not for you. It eliminates foul smells and does not add any unwanted fragrances where it is placed. Just follow the simple directions that come with the unit, and it should be active for about a year. This is my third one in 3 years. That should tell a lot! Simply: it works.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M. Pedrazzoli

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car to help neutralize the cigarette odor. I smoke in my car pretty regularly, and it does help dampen the smell. When I smoke daily, I can still smell the cigarettes but it's not overwhelming. However, with the pandemic I haven't been going out as much, and I've noticed if I haven't gotten into my car/smoked in my car for a few days, the smell disappears much more quickly than if I had nothing at all. Looks large, but relatively unobtrusive which is nice
customer_reviews.author: SweetMidnyteKiss

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky car!
customer_reviews.text: Ok ok, so I'm not confident that I'll remember to let this thing hang out in the sun every so often to "recharge", but so far so good. I ride horses and my car typically smells like sweat and manure, but this little air freshener has tamed the wonk in my car. I also bought one for my boyfriend who habitually spills coffee in his car, this thing even works for those noxious smells!
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I left this set outside on deck for an entire day in direct sun light. It has been in my car for a week and car hasn't been used at all. I went out today and there is no difference in the smell of car. Still can smell the wet dog smell from a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rhapsody1313

customer_reviews.title: seems to do what is expected
customer_reviews.text: really is just kind of a invisable deodorizer.. hangs off the back of the seat and seems to keep the car from having any odors. it has no smell to it at all, and about once every 2 weeks I set it out in the sun to be sure its activated. It was a little pricey for what you get but it does seem to work better than those smelly cover up things that are done in a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS FOR MYSTERY ODORS U CANT GET RID OF 💯
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used car that had a funny foot odor..& a funky odor coming out of AC vents! I spent all kinds of money on product sprays & AC vent cleaners! Nothing worked!! I am so glad I found this product! It completely took the funky smells away!! It is scentless! THANKU
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I bought a truck that was owned by a smoker. I was excited due to the reviews but I was disappointed because they really did not do the trick. People still made comments about how the truck smelled of cig smoke and I even had the truck detailed in an effort to give this product a fighting chance. I was really hopeful. I even bought 2 in the hopes that it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer81321

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for a year, buying another.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 1st one in Feb 2019, now it's Jan 2020 and I'm getting another. I think it doesn't quite last the full year, but most of it. Mind you, I'm not a smoker. I just have am embarrassing addiction to Jack in the Box. I leave the bags in the car, and it just doesn't smell like fast food because of this air freshener. Good enough for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Axxxgill

customer_reviews.title: Unsure how effective this is
customer_reviews.text: I use it, but I do not know how much it is doing. You do need to charge it in sunlight every so often, so during the winter months, I dont think it works as well. But I will say my car doesnt have any odors no matter what is in it, but in the winter months it does smell like the food I may have eaten in there or something else. So it works as long as it stays charged?
customer_reviews.author: Trainer April

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The air freshener hasn’t removed the odors. We are willing to go a little longer to see if it works. When car is closed overnight, the odor is strongest in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help much
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help eliminate odors. Observed when there was one of these odors: cigs, weeds, food, spilled beer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work as well for me as it seems to for others. I have used charcoal for filtering other things in my life, drinking water is my favorite. I like the concept, but it just hasn't performed how I would have liked in my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this air freshener very long; however, I noticed a significant difference in my vehicle after the first few days!! Wow! I smoke in my car a lot and in the past the smell upon entering my car was terrible; not now, I honestly do not smell the foul odor of smoke anymore!!! i hope it last a full year as stated!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Conner

customer_reviews.title: It’s a gimmick freshener not much else
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because I thought it was supposed to freshen up the car but it doesn’t seem to be doing much. It does look neat but not much else. Following up: the item does not absorb any unwanted smells. It simply doesn't work at all, if i could get my money back i would have done so. My advice is not to purchase this item save yourself 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: GUTZ

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED! WASTING MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Mount in a small sedan for over a month and didn’t work at all. Didn’t eliminate the odor nor did it help the car smell better. Really suggest buying others rather wasting money in this!
customer_reviews.author: ruoyuanwang

customer_reviews.title: Works well but does take time.
customer_reviews.text: I have a car now that was used by a heavy smoker. The leather sets and interior were difficult to clean and deodorize. I bought this and it does work, but does take some time. I usually take it back out into the sun every couple weeks to reactivate. But overall works well and has no scent, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Poor materials, don’t suggest buying

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! This works by simply eliminating bad smells that are in the vehicle. There is no scents or smells coming from this product. This leaves the air in your vehicle smelling clean and odor free, which is great. Don't forget to hang it out in the sun for a couple hours monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as well as promised
customer_reviews.text: We bought a used car and realized that the previous owner must have been a smoker. This air freshener did not really live up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Wireless

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try and control various odors in my car and so far I'm happy to say that I feel like it does a pretty good job. I had a used up air freshener that you couldn't smell anymore still in my car and after a few days, I could actually smell the air freshener again and the car seemed more "neutral" smelling, if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great! So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Took the smell right out of my car! I have a broken window seal on the front driver side of my 2006 Chevy Impala...every-time it rains hard my seat gets wet thus creating a sour moldy smell(very yucky)...this was a great quick fix while I save to get the seal fixed! Thank you! - a college kid
customer_reviews.author: Haleigh Lassiter

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to eliminate the odor out of my wife and my car, it did 100% elimination of the odor, then I tried it in our new painted master bathroom that was painted, it did eliminate 100% odor but the price is not justified.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Smoke free woohoo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car and it did a great job, exactly what It said it would do to eliminate odors. My husband was jealous so I had to buy one for his car. He is a smoker and you would never be able to tell anyone ever smoked in his truck. If you ever have a smoker in your car, you need to have this filter.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: just ok?
customer_reviews.text: I read amazing reviews about this I was so excited at first I thought yes it worked to get cigarettes smells out of my car (I don't smoke I bought it that way) but then it has retuned the smell a little so the air freshener has stopped working, I tried putting it in the sun like it says but no u luck so idk? so my review is worked good at first maybe you will have better luck with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No odors and seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed any odors in my car, but I'm not convinced it's due to this. I've had this air freshener in my car for several weeks, and it seems to work OK. However, I already keep the interior of my car pretty clean, so I'm not sure how many odors this item needs to purify...
customer_reviews.author: DR Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! There are NO odors in my car at all!!! UPDATE: Have had this for a year & just now it is no longer working. Great Product!!! For a year this has worked so I believe anyone that has smells in your car this is the product for you! Smoker in household & this cleared up any smell in my car. Love this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Works for even the harshest smells
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have owned. I had one in a used car that smelled of cigarette smoke, within about a month the smell was gone. This air freshener will get rid of even the harshest smell and keep it gone. I can't rave enough about this product and I will continue to use them for all of my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: hof

customer_reviews.title: Piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: The scent was nonexistent upon opening the package and I tried to leave it in the car hoping for something, but nothing worked
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Oxley-Parker

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: I work with autoclaves, and a lot of the time the odors that come from them are pretty nasty.They permiate my clothing and then my vehicles interior etc. The inside of my vehicle has smelled so bad, that I have had service centers refuse to drive my vehicle, therefore refusing me service.I bought one of these fresheners, and within 3 days, the odors in my vehicle have all but disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great deodorizer
customer_reviews.text: I had what seemed to be a musky urine-like odor coming from my car that I couldn't get rid of. After using the PURGGO air freshener, the smell seems to have disappeared. The only bad thing about this product is that it will get rid of other air freshener smells, but that's what this product was meant to do. I had a brand new air freshener along with the PURGGO put in my car, and the air freshener lasted only 2 weeks compared to the 6 weeks it was designed for, so at least I know the PURGGO is doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chen

customer_reviews.title: 100% will be buying again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pre-owned vehicle and the previous owner must have smoked with the windows up. I felt like it’s all I could smell in my new car. I didn’t want to use chemicals to mask the odor, I wanted it eliminated. So I purchased this and replaced the cabin filter, within a day the car had zero odor. 10/10 would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The air fresher does not eliminate odors. My boyrfriend smoked in the care and for 4 days the care smelled like cigarattes. I had to spray perfume to get rid of the odor. I do not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Shenika

customer_reviews.title: Super product at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a product that does what it truly says it's will I had a terrible smell in my vehicle due to a window being down for some time and getting water in it it has completely eliminated the smell and I absolutely love these and would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: tony c.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: We unfortunately had to put my dog to rest and on the way to the vet, she had an accident in the car. I carpet cleaned, bombed the car and baking soda....nothing worked as well as these. I bought two to hang on the backseat headrest. I like their ease of use, look and performance!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money , this product doesn't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: GIA

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: this thing does absolutely nothing. I have not noticed a difference and the car still smells. the only thing that helps was cleaning the car and using an actual air freshener.
customer_reviews.author: gus oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: There is no scent to this air filter. I bought a used car that had a perfume smell that was okay for a minute but started to bother me after a few days. After placing this filter in the car the smell was gone overnight! It worked so well I bought one for my sister. Now I can enjoy my vehicle and the fresh air. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best Air Freshener EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt have very high expectations. I smoke cigarettes in my car and couldn't get rid of the smell. Put this in it, a week later the smell of cigarettes was completely gone!!!! It works amazing. And blends in with your dark cover seats so you really dont know its there
customer_reviews.author: jacob burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Stinky dog smell GONE
customer_reviews.text: Drive a crossover and always have dogs in my car. Mine, my friends', my coworkers'. Car always smells but this helped a LOT. Car smells neutral now. Doesn't necessarily give it a GOOD smell but gets rid of the BAD. Good for me because I didn't want anything with fragrance in the car that could irritate me or my pups.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This never had any scent and never eliminated smells. This is a complete waste of money and I wish I could be refunded
customer_reviews.author: John Geekie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I had my mom's vehicle detailed and whatever they used to shampoo the seats and carpets left a horrible smell in the car. I tried leaving the windows open to air it out, nothing worked. I was skeptical that these would work but they did. I was so pleased with them I purchased a second one. I would recommend these for anyone dealing with a smelly car.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: itjustworks
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if it works but I cant smell anything so it must be working
customer_reviews.author: Carson K.

customer_reviews.title: I think its working!
customer_reviews.text: I quit smoking three years ago and after having the interior detailed, there was still that faint cigarette smell. I looked at this for 6 months before I finally bought it. Each day I think it gets a little better so I think in a little time the smell will be gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this product is wonderful. My son is a heavy smoker & I almost threw up when I stuck my head in his car. I bought this air freshener & hung it his car. Three days later I checked & the smell was actually gone. I was so impressed, I purchased 4 more. Impressive!!
customer_reviews.author: Finally retired

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter comes to visit me Few times a year. She always complains about the cigarette smell in my car after I cleaned it out and sprayed. I bought ur pillow and was amazed how the odor disappeared. I picked up my daughter in my car the other day and she asked me if I had stopped smoking!!!!! She didn’t smell a thing!!! Fantastic product! It really works!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Vinton

customer_reviews.title: Seem ok
customer_reviews.text: Left in the sun for about 2 hours. Seem to work it has no smell or nothing but usually I open my car door in the morning because I am a smoker and today my car smell like nothing but we will see how the product is .
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Fuzinski

customer_reviews.title: Is it suppose to smell like something? Eliminates oders well but no scent to it.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't smell like anything at all but eliminates/reduces that musty smoke smell in my car from smoking in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I got a bad one but followed instructions and didn’t even smell the difference. Paid $35 for two so I can placed them in two cars. Waste of money, hopefully the seller can do something about it. Since there’s no “contact seller” options, I’ll just write a short review.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent eco-friendly product! The day it arrived I had accidentally burned some potpourri simmering on the stove. I thought, what the heck, I would give this odor eliminator a try and hung it over the knobs of a kitchen cabinet. It worked!!! Several hours later there was absolutely no lingering foul burn odor at all. Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean fresh air...
customer_reviews.text: I read about this in an HGTVstory about essentials for car travel and decided to give it a try. Since I smoke in my car I’m always concerned about eliminating that odor and so far this is working great. I received an email the day after it was delivered containing helpful information such as setting it in the sun for one hour before using it for the first time. I’m pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey S.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well at neutralizing odors
customer_reviews.text: Neutralizes every smell you could possibly imagine, no matter how strong. The charcoal in this product is perfect to use in a car because the sun/heat activates the charcoal which is what makes the product work so well at absorbing odors. It is nice to get in my car every day and smell nothing but, well, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Browning

customer_reviews.title: no tools needed. Easy to install.  Hangs on back of seat with very little upkeep.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a car and the previous owners were smokers. I tried several smoke remover products. Some worked slightly and some not at all. The Purggo car air freshener has worked best of all the products I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine H.

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted...
customer_reviews.text: Really sad that I wasted money on a product that made car smell worse. No for real, it made my whole car smell REALLY bad for days. I did the necessary instructions but it just kept making car smell worse. EDIT: Customer service gave me refund. They listened and took care of it nicely. So two stars for that
customer_reviews.author: MAk5

customer_reviews.title: but everyone that's gotten in my car since I started using it (non-smokers) have said it doesn't smell like smoke at all
customer_reviews.text: I have been smoking flavored cigars in my car for the past year and have tried lots of air fresheners but nothing helped, until this. Not just fresh smoke, but year old smoke smell seems to be gone after only 1 day of use. Someone with an extra sensitive nose might, maybe, still smell something, but everyone that's gotten in my car since I started using it (non-smokers) have said it doesn't smell like smoke at all.
customer_reviews.author: jksamuell

customer_reviews.title: Clean, mountain-style air
customer_reviews.text: Feels weird to write it, but this deodorizer is phenomenal. I got one for our new car--the dealer smell/freshers have slowly died off, but I realized the car's air has a bite to it. Reminds me of hiking in the mountains, and the fresh, clean biting feeling in my nose is exactly what I wanted from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how well it works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bcs I now live in Texas where the humidity is high. My car was humid and smelly due to leaving the windows cracked after a big rain. I bought air fresheners which gave my car a sickening smell. I wanted NO SMELL...not an over powering chemical flower smell! After putting this in my car, it no longer stinks and the humidity has decreased. I really am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing definitely works if you use it properly. My convertible top would leak in heavy rain and would have this dirty sock, mildew stench for a couple days till it dried. Not anymore! Make sure you don’t forget to put it in the sun occasionally for it to reactivate. It won’t work well if you don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Odor eliminator
customer_reviews.text: Great product but need to put in sun for hr or so first. Then I put in car and you can’t smell smoke at all. Everyday it is clean and smoke free. Does not give off any scent, just eliminates them.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: I recommended this product to my friends
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Purggo I have purchased over the years, I am a smoker and whenever I enter my car I do not have that stale cigarette smell in the car, or the smell of another air freshener trying to mask the smell of the cigarette. I recommended this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: tanksleepy

product_meta.title: PURGGO Car Air Freshener - Lasts 365+ Days - No Chemicals - 100% Activated Bamboo Charcoal - Fragrance-Free Deodorizer, Natural Auto Odor Eliminator, Air Purifier, Neutralizer, Absorb Smoke Smell
feature_bullets: CHEMICAL-FREE - Contains no fragrance, no plastic, no chemicals. PURGGO is made with 100% bamboo charcoal that naturally absorbs odor. PURGGO is healthy and safe for you, your kids, and your pets. It's also great for people with allergies, asthma, stuffy nose, and other breathing sensitivities.

ELIMINATE (NOT MASK) ODOR - Porous bamboo charcoal acts like a big sponge. As air organically passes through, odor particles are trapped on the surfaces inside the charcoal. PURGGO actually removes odor, rather than covering it up!

LASTS MORE THAN 365+ DAYS - The world's longest lasting car air freshener. PURGGO can be used for more than 365 days, while common car fresheners only last up to 45 days. Save your time and money. Say NO to pricey refills.

SUSTAINABLE - Made with bamboo and hemp, two of the most renewable natural resources in the world. At the end of its lifecycle, PURGGO’s bamboo charcoal can be used as a natural fertilizer for your plants.

FRESH AIR GUARANTEED - We are dedicated to providing amazing customer service. We are confident that your car will smell fresh and clean all year long with PURGGO. Contact our responsive customer service team if you are not satisfied with your purchase, and we’ll make it right.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars2,008 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
